Name: Candy Mandy
About the game: Classic game in the popular 'three in a row' genre. Shift identical figures in one row to destroy them and get points. More identical figures in the row - more points and bonuses. Decoration on the subject of sweets and various treats. The game offers nearly a hundred simple levels, an easy soundtrack and a good mindful training. Each level can be completed on 1, 2 and 3 stars for an additional challenge. And all this at the lowest available price.
